title: TransferTemplate
description: A template for ledger-local transfer of funds that can be missing some transfer fields

ledger.description: The ledger where the transfer will take place

debits.description: Funds that go into the transfer

credits.description: Funds that come out of the transfer

part_of_settlement.description: Larger settlement that this transfer is a part of.

state.description: The current state of the transfer (informational only)

execution_condition.description: The condition for executing the transfer

execution_condition_fulfillment.description: Proof that the execution_condition has been met

cancellation_condition.description: The condition for cancelling the transfer

cancellation_condition_fulfillment.description: Proof that the cancellation_condition has been met

expiry_duration.description: Time in seconds between proposed_at and expires_at. Set in quotes from settlement systems but not valid in actual transfers

expires_at.description: The date when the transfer expires and will be rejected by the ledger

proposed_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally proposed

pre_prepared_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally pre_prepared

prepared_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally prepared

pre_executed_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally pre_executed

executed_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally executed

rejected_at.description: An informational field added by the ledger to indicate when the transfer was originally rejected
